title: Luminary Tour: André Kertész—Postcards from Paris
short_description: On this guided small-group tour alongside fellow Luminary members, explore Postcards from Paris, which brings together acclaimed photographer André Kertész’s rare prints on postcard paper and offers insight into the artist's early, experimental years.
list_description: Explore acclaimed photographer André Kertész's iconic images on a guided small-group tour alongside fellow Luminary members.
description:
On this guided small-group tour alongside fellow Luminary members, explore Postcards from Paris, which brings together acclaimed photographer André Kertész’s rare prints on postcard paper and offers insight into the artist's early, experimental years.

Open exclusively to Luminary members, this tour requires advance registration and is limited to twelve participants. The tour lasts approximately 50 minutes. View all upcoming Luminary programs.

Physical distancing and other visiting policies must be observed.

Coat and bag check, dining, and valet services are currently unavailable. Find further information on what to expect on our website.

Contact Us

If you have questions or are interested in learning more about Luminary membership, we’d be delighted to hear from you. Please contact us at (312) 443-3735 or luminary@artic.edu.
buy_button_caption:
$50 per person

This tour is limited to twelve participants.
